titles.title: A bill to withdraw Federal land in Finger Lakes National Forest, New York, from entry, appropriation, disposal, or disposition under certain Federal laws.
A bill to withdraw Federal land in Finger Lakes National Forest, New York, from entry, appropriation, disposal, or disposition under certain Federal laws.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: Withdraws all Federal land in Finger Lakes National Forest, New York, from: (1) all forms of entry, appropriation, or disposal under public land laws; and (2) disposition under all laws relating to oil and gas leasing.
